title: Captain America: Winter Soldier Vol. 1: Out of Time (Hardcover)
description:
Cap is awakened in the dead of the night by agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., who need the kind of help only he can provide. But the corpse he finds on the Heli-carrier brings him face-to-face with the unthinkable, and opens doors to terror and manipulation he never dreamed possible! It's a new beginning as four-time Eisner-nominated Best Writer Ed Brubaker makes his Marvel debut, joined by white-hot artist Steve Epting! As the new regular creative team, they will take Cap's life in directions fans will never see coming! Collects CAPTAIN AMERICA #1-7.
176 pages./ T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP …$21.99
